nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Into Battle is a LEGO Star Wars book, that was published on July 7, 2015.
Do you trust your friends and know your enemies?

Learn all about the biggest and most important battles in LEGO® galactic history. Join the generals, soldiers, Jedi, and Rebels on their missions, and discover the traps, betrayals, and triumphs. Encounter the mysterious Sith, their droid armies, villainous bounty hunters, and pirates.
See great powers clash in the most exciting lightsaber duels, the most daring space fights, and the mightiest land battles in DK Adventures: LEGO® Star Wars®: Into Battle!
